Description: Hivemind-Prism Compute Infrastructure - ECS, Fargate, and Lambda

Properties.Description: ECS task role for Archaeologist agent: Context discovery and metadata extraction
ECS task role for Strategist agent: Planning and tool selection
ECS task role for Coordinator agent: Resource allocation and scheduling
ECS task role for Synthesizer agent: Finding generation from tool results
ECS task role for Critic agent: Finding validation and challenge
ECS task role for Archivist agent: Final storage and memory formation
Role for MCP tool server tasks (read-only code access)
Lambda execution role: Unpack and validate uploaded code
Lambda execution role: Create Kendra memory documents
Lambda execution role: Handle mission failures
